channel.title: Crown help[bluur]
channel.description:
Dear moparscapers,
I want to add another 2 ranks on my server. I want that 1 rank have admin crown and 1 have mod crown. But how can i make it that when ur rights are set to 4 or 5 it will show the crown next to ur name like on rights 2?

item.title: Crown help[bluur]
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

  1. Add custom crowns
  2. Add the MODICONS into youâ€™re sprites
  3. Add the new rank (if you know how)
